content:
Q: What happens when I submit a claim?
A: Within 3 business days of receiving your claim, we will send you an acknowledgement. We will request for additional documents within 7 business days if claim documents are incomplete. Once we receive all necessary information and have completed a full investigation required to assess your claim, we will decide to accept or decline your claim and inform you of our decision within 7 business days.
questions: What is the initial response time after submitting a claim?
How long does it take to receive an acknowledgement after submitting a claim?
What happens if the claim documents submitted are incomplete?
Within how many business days will I be notified if additional documents are needed for my claim?
What is the total time taken to make a decision on a claim after all documents are submitted?
How long after submitting all necessary information will I be informed about the decision on my claim?
What are the steps taken by the company after a claim is submitted?
What does the company do if they require more information to assess a claim?
How will I be informed about the acceptance or decline of my claim?
What is the process followed by the company to investigate a claim?
